component.name: Rust4Diva
component.summary: Cross platform mod manager for Project Diva Mega Mix+

description.p: Cross platform mod manager for Project Diva Mega Mix+ Supports in app mod downloads. Oneclick downloads from gamebanana.com. (supported on linux/steam deck, and windows)

ul.li: Drag'n'Drop to change mod priority
In App Mod config editor
There is now a button to delete an installed mod (There is a confirmation Dialog)
Added a first time setup screen (this will be displayed to existing users on first launch of the update)
QoL Change: Hold modifier keys to change how far a mod is moved when using the priority buttons
QoL: Dark Mode Toggle
On first run a window will be displayed confirming some settings
There is an option to import from DMM (Diva Mod Manager)
DMM loadouts are imported as modpacks and the last activated loadout is used as the global priority
